title: rAjarAjEshvari mAtangi natajanAvana
sahitya:
rAjarAjEshvari mAtangi natajanaAvana shubhakari shankari nava parvAyuta gItarata 
gOpAlankrta manI mNTapa vAsini rAcar abhaNDAsura chEdini ravicandra kuNDala lOlOlAsini


anupallavi

  shrI jagannAyaki sahasrAra divya daLa padma mada madhukari tribhuvana mahatAnanda kAriNi 
shiva hrdayAnanda kELini cantAna vATikAdi pancaka dharOdhyAna vanacAriNi mAmava


caraNam    cintAmaNi pItha nilayE cidAnanda para karuNAlayE mandAra saubhadrAdishaya 
mAlini marakata valayE nandAnanda tanayE shiva navanItE svara hrdayAlayE
				(madhyamakAlam)
nindita bandUka shaurabhAruNa taruNAdhara vimalE jaya jaya 
nirupamAdhika cidambara nartana saha nartana pada yugaLE mAmava
